Name: Lollo Campaign V
Description: You have a new "Lollo Petter" order. Please fulfill it in time.
QuestDesc: You have a new "Lollo Petter" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The business today is: "Lollo Petter."

Options.PlotLineKey: You want me to pet you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That would be nice... Just kidding. You'll be petting animals for other people. The demand has been growing lately.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are many animals roaming in the city. People living in other places would like you to pet and feed the animals in their place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Actually, I once dealt with a similar order as a courier. The sender was a human, but the recipient was a hound named "Mimi"...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the customer told me... "I bought some jerky in Rinascita. Please help me feed the jerky to Mimi the dog in Jinzhou city!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At that time, I was totally lost because offering that service wasn't something we did, but it really got me thinking about a whole new business opportunity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding! You have a new petting order.Please fulfill the order in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And this time we're looking for... a tabby cat named "Wangcai"? Oh my, I know this cat. I even have an emoji of it on my Terminal!

Options.PlotLineKey: I must have the emoji. Send it to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's see here... The emoji, and Wangcai's location... There, I've forwarded them to you! Remember to bring Wangcai's favorite fish fillet!

Dialogues.Speaker: Onlookers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have too many people trying to feed it at once. It looks scared. Step back, everyone!

Dialogues.Speaker: Onlookers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Got it! Wangcai is hiding in the braces behind the light box, but his primordial pouch is too fat. He's stuck.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wangcai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow meow meow...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me try the cat language translation module!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wangcai said: "Numb. Something's zapping me inside the light box. My tummy feels numb. Please get me out quickly."

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quick. Turn off the circuit module, and I'll go save Wangcai.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You and Xuanyin join forces to save Wangcai, prompting cheers from the crowd. After thanking you, Xuanyin takes Wangcai to the Academy's medical department. It seems you'll have to wait until next time to feed Wangcai.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You tell Maji about the event, leaving him speechless for a moment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Being a cat is way better than being a human.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't write today's report in this case, but if I were a cat, I would never have to write any report. Sob sob...

Options.PlotLineKey: You can try another of your business ideas tomorrow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. Let me cope with this now. Everything will be fine tomorrow.
